page.title: 17 SOCIAL CONCERN OF LITCHAM
page.content: The most common comment was that Litcham is quiet and peaceful.This is so because the area is a village and has few amenities.The elder generation find it quiet and the perfect situation to live in,the younger people also find it quiet but a bit boring.Most of the children would like regular clubs to start. The main concern was the lack of amenities.Road networks and transport systems were also complained about.The network is adequete but there is a demand for more A roads.Also bus routes are complained about.There is'nt a bus every day and alot of people would find this very helpful.
